Interesting. Do they use sampled crowd noise then listen for messages? If you have the web address, I'd like to check it out. -Bill

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:                                  
 I did a google on crowd noise and found several sites using it for EVP, as 
 well an an Austrailian site that acutally mentioned getting the same effect 
 from an AM/FM radio.
